name: The Christ Child as the Good Shepherd
description: The Christ Child as the Good Shepherd; Bartolomé Esteban Murillo (Spanish, 1617 - 1682); about 1675 - 1680; Pen and brown ink over black chalk; 13.2 x 10.3 cm (5 3/16 x 4 1/16 in.); 94.GA.80; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Christ Child as the Good Shepherd
medium: Pen and brown ink over black chalk
